programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jonathan and Kerry are in the market for a new home to share memories in with their family; with a budget of 12 million dollars, Real Estate Agent Tav Schembri is challenged to find the family their dream home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Vicky find the forever home of her dreams? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase and special appearances by guest agent Jasmine Xuereb and mortgage broker Paul Meredith.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Jessica and Mark are a young couple living and working in Thailand after meeting there several years ago and falling in love. They are looking for a permanent home in Bangkok, and after chatting with her friend Mae, Jessica knows that Mike Donia is the man for the job.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special guest appearance by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E24 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Giulia and Scott have recently come into an inheritance and want the house of their dreams. Currently, they live in a modest bungalow in a busy neighbourhood but would prefer to live in a secluded house with a magnificent view. Ideally, Giulia also wants a house that has separate living quarters for her ageing parents.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a vehicle that struck a police car. Two men deny the lawnmower in their truck is stolen. Deputies are called when a mother attempts to run her daughter over.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E17 Rocks in my Socks
programme.desc: Deputies discover a purse and a sock containing paraphernalia during an arrest. Deputies pursue an intoxicated motorcyclist. A woman is suspected of stealing a cake.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect uses bizarre driving techniques to elude cops. A tough officer wades through a forest of denial before finding the crack. Police search for man accused of shooting up the neighborhood.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drug dealer swallows something suspicious as deputies move in to arrest him. Deputies pull over a father with his son in the car. A woman files a kidnapping report against her own boyfriend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer poses as a prostitute in an attempt to attract “johns”. A suspect flees on foot through the woods following an assault. An officer investigates a local bar known for illegal activity.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect leads police on an extended pursuit throughout New Orleans. When he’s flipped off by his neighbors, a man responds by firing a gun. Police pull over a Porsche and discover it’s stolen.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer is forced to subdue a suspect with his baton. A man asks deputies to give him back his drugs before taking him to jail. A man under the influence causes a disturbance at an apartment complex.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E22 And Through the Woods
programme.desc: Officers chase a fleeing suspect as he runs through the woods and into a rose bush. An elderly man puts himself in the middle of a knife fight. Two brothers disagree over letting officers search their car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue a male suspect in a speeding truck and ultimately force the vehicle off the road, the suspect is taken into custody without injury. Officers respond to a domestic abuse call. Officers are called to a home where a dead body is found.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man runs from Police over a parole violation. Officers respond when a trouble maker is expelled from a bar for bad behavior. Police pursue a man after he bails from his car during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An arrest is made in a buy-bust sting operation. An elderly man is questioned after reportedly kicking a juvenile in the face. A man is shot in the head by his roommate.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A patrolman plays linebacker when a fleeing thief runs right into him. Armed-robbery victims give a colorful play-by-play on surveillance footage of the crime. Officers have to get tearful children back to their estranged mother.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect goes out to get his haircut and winds up in jail. Officers try to piece together a puzzling street fight between a boxer and his confused friend. Cops give a suspect every chance to admit to his obvious crime.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies tase a man who almost ran over a deputy with his truck. A man gives police false information after saving a boy who fell into a pool. A woman tries to buy drugs from an undercover officer.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S27 : E14 We Know Who You Are
programme.desc: Officers are forced to taze a suicidal man for his own good. A familiar face makes cops chase him through a grass field. No lie is too big for a suspect who seeks refuge in a condemned house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspicious driver takes police on a neighborhood chase. Officers are called to capture a 12-foot python hiding outside a home. Officers suspect a funny walking motorist is hiding something in his shoe.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: During a routine traffic stop, an Officer recognizes the passengers from a prior drug related arrest. A K-9 unit assists in the pursuit of a grand theft auto suspect who flees on foot. An arrest is made after a couple leaving a known drug house is pulled over and questioned.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer subdues a young man in mental duress. Officers stop a suspicious vehicle and find drug paraphernalia inside the woman's car. Officers respond to a robbery in progress.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A kind man gets more than he bargained for from his new roommate. Cops discover the unexpected consequences of punching a scooter. Officers stop a sober suspect who may not be from the same planet as them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An Officer’s patrol of an area known for drug activity turns into a foot chase that ends with the suspect running into a tree. programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver denies ownership of what police find in his car. Police conduct a narcotics sting that nets several arrests. A deputy removes a pooch from the scene of an accident.

programme.title: Cops

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Rustie Lee's Eat To The Beat!
programme.desc: Food glorious food! The 70s & 80s were full of edible bands & songs, and TV chef Rustie Lee has raided the fridge & pantry to serve up pop's sweet treats. It's going to be a riot!

programme.title: Simply Having A Wonderful Xmas!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simply Having A Wonderful Xmas!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits & festive favourites from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Santa hat, platform boots & tinsel at the ready?

programme.title: Festive Faves! 70s v 60s v 50s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Festive Faves! 70s v 60s v 50s
programme.desc: 3 decades of classic festive faves from Bing Crosby & Perry Como to Boney M & Paul McCartney.

programme.title: Tony's Sensational 70s Xmas!
programme.desc: Tinsel Tony Blackburn with tons of terrific tunes & festive fun for Christmas - all from the 1970s!

programme.title: Simply Having A Wonderful Xmas!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simply Having A Wonderful Xmas!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits & festive favourites from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Santa hat, platform boots & tinsel at the ready?

programme.title: The Greatest Karaoke Party 50!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Greatest Karaoke Party 50!
programme.desc: Pour your favourite drink, use the TV remote as a fake mic, and sing your head off to the finest hits of the decade from music legends like ABBA, Freddie, Elton, Dolly, Rod & more!

programme.title: Simply Having A Wonderful Xmas!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simply Having A Wonderful Xmas!
programme.desc: Feelgood hits & festive favourites from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Santa hat, platform boots & tinsel at the ready?

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts & inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: Seven Inch Heroes! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 songs from the cooler end of the 70s spectrum - designed for repeated plays! From Free to The Police via Thin Lizzy, The Clash & Lene Lovich.

programme.title: Punk & Disorderly!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s songs the cool kids were listening to in the latter half of the decade - expect skinny jeans, safety pins, guitars and just a few snarls!

programme.title: 1970s Glastonbury Headliners!
programme.desc: Since the first festival in 1970, there were only another 2 in the decade - in 1971 & 1979. But these were the acts that headlined & performed, and one that didn't!

programme.title: Antiques Rockshow with Robin Banks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Antiques Rockshow with Robin Banks
programme.desc: Crammed full with extraordinary finds, hidden treasures, and plenty of old relics! From AC/DC & Led Zep, to Bowie & Black Sabbath - how many of these family heirlooms do you own?

programme.title: Power Pop Day!
programme.desc: Non-stop 70s rock & power ballads - all day!

programme.title: Bam's Power Hours! 1970-1979
programme.desc: A 10 hour pentathlon of power - a deafening decade of hits! 130 songs to turn up loud, presented by the only man who can - Bam!

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes from the year Richard Nixon left the US Presidency after Watergate, Prog Rock dominated the album charts & inflation hit double digits. Imagine that!

programme.title: Seven Inch Heroes! 1970-1979
programme.desc: 50 songs from the cooler end of the 70s spectrum - designed for repeated plays! From Free to The Police via Thin Lizzy, The Clash & Lene Lovich.

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 40 Guilty Pleasures!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's 40 Guilty Pleasures!
programme.desc: Songs you really like but are a bit too embarrassed to admit. Don't worry, we're all in the same boat here & Pat urges you to try to have a little less shame in your musical game!

programme.title: Groovy Little Numbers!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: The Best 1969 Party - Ever!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Best 1969 Party - Ever!
programme.desc: The year that set the musical agenda for the whole of the next decade. 20 scene setters with songs for every taste, whether you like The Beatles, The Stones or the Archies!

programme.title: Far Out, Man!
programme.desc: Over-bearded men & leftfield ladies - all with fabulous tunes! These are alternative hits from the west coast, the underground & the counter culture of the 1970s.

programme.title: Pat Sharp's Disco Explosion!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pat Sharp's Disco Explosion!
programme.desc: Get down to Studio 54 with Abba on songwriting duties, the Bee Gees on production, Chic's string section & Pat Sharp on rhythm guitar!

programme.title: All Day - We're Down at The Disco!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 All Day - We're Down at The Disco!
programme.desc: Get on the Love train with some top tunes to satisfy those Boogie Nights!

programme.title: 70s - A Decade of Dance!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 70s - A Decade of Dance!
programme.desc: In order - 6 hours of dancefloor devastation! From Soul to Glam to Disco to Pop - it's time to get your boogie boots at the ready!

programme.title: Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Simon Bates 70s Pop! Top 50
programme.desc: Simon Bates with a celebration of a decade - the 50 biggest pure pop hits of the 70s. He's got a bucketload of Boney M, oodles of the Osmonds & an armful of Abba!

programme.title: 70s School Disco!
programme.desc: From the era of Glam Rock, New Wave & Disco - it's all the party hits from just 1 decade - the 1970s! Platform boots & flares at the ready?

programme.title: Pat Sharp's 40 Guilty Pleasures!

programme.desc: Songs you really like but are a bit too embarrassed to admit. Don't worry, we're all in the same boat here & Pat urges you to try to have a little less shame in your musical game!

programme.title: Born in the USA! 70 from the 70s
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Born in the USA! 70 from the 70s
programme.desc: In order, 70 US stars with 70 famous songs. From Bob Dylan & The Supremes in 1970 to Prince & The Pointer Sisters in 1979.

programme.title: Help Me Make It Through the Night!
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Help Me Make It Through the Night!
programme.desc: Non-stop love songs, back to back all night, from the era of Leo Sayer, Carpenters, The Bee Gees & Minnie Ripperton.

programme.title: Beer Brats & BBQ Ribs
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up cheddar beer brats, BBQ lamb ribs, watermelon soju punch, & warm crispy donuts.

programme.title: Bougie Badass Burgers
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde goes big with a dry-aged beef burger, a pork patty melt, & a crunchy mushroom tortilla burger.

programme.title: Feast of Killer Crab & Perfect Pork Belly
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde makes a fierce feast with chili crab, adobo potatoes, grilled pork belly, & stuffed branzino.

programme.title: Luxe Lobster & Prime Rib
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde preps perfect prime rib, lobster in chili sauce, charred green beans, & cheddar-stuffed rolls.

programme.title: Summer Seafood Smorgasbord
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde serves up shrimp cocktail, breaded clams, king crab with butter, and a mango frozen daiquiri.

programme.title: Deluxe Dogs with Crusted Corn & Potatoes
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde makes loaded hot dogs, spiced potato salad, chorizo crusted corn, & banana pudding pops.

programme.title: Top of the Line Steaks
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up a NY strip steak, short ribs & chili paste, and a chateaubriand with broccolini.

programme.title: Grilled Chicken 3 Ways
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde makes smoky chicken wings, whole roasted chicken, and chicken patties with chili lime noodles.

programme.title: Scrumptious Summer Sandwiches
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde makes an angry lobster club, a lamb birria torta, and an Italian beef combo with chili cheese.

programme.title: A Festive & Flavorful Christmas in July
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 All Up In My Grill
programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde gets festive with ham & pineapple sliders, grilled sweet potatoes, and a coconut cocktail.

programme.title: The Perfection of Pork

programme.desc: Chef Dale Talde grills up a root beer glazed pork banh mi, chorizo fried rice, & sausage stuffed peppers.

programme.title: Above the Rocky Mountains
programme.desc: Showcasing one of the world's most famous mountain ranges, Banff National Park, from a higher perspective and is paired with healing music and subtle real-life nature sounds; soaring over places like Lake Louise and more from the Canadian Rockies.

programme.title: A Day in Paradise
programme.desc: Filmed in 2013 by David Huting, the tiny island is hidden off of the northeastern coast of the outer Fiji Islands (near Taveuni), and boasts a perfect white sandy beach, groves of palm trees, and a majestic lagoon that shelters the island from all sides. It has more turtle visitors than humans!

programme.title: Tutoko River: New Zealand
programme.desc: Rushing waters through rocky rapids.

programme.title: Atuh Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Take a tour of beautiful Indonesian waters, surrounded by impressive rock formations.

programme.title: Wild Window
programme.desc: A look at the dazzling fish that inhabit the marine landscapes of the Tropical Pacific; exploring their daily lives as they forage and school in the depths of the ocean.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s adventures in Perth kick off with him immersing himself in the historic grandeur of the Scone Castle, where a mysterious stone tells tales of Scottish monarchs. But the real thunder of the Highlands awaits at the Braemar Games gathering, where tartan meets brawn, and Robbie learns that embracing his Scottish side involves more than just kilts and castles.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 Backpack Novi Sad, Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Novi Sad, the financial and industrial hub of Serbia.Starting with canoeing on Danube and later exploring the city and its landmarks.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Boarding Pass Santa Village, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Santa Village at Rovaniemi, where she reads some of the letters that children from around the world write to him.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Xplore Bulgaria Sunny Beach
programme.desc: Luxurious hotels, thrilling water parks, inexpensive food and almost 300 days of bright sunny weather make Bulgaria’s biggest seaside resort, Sunny Beach popular for budget beach getaways. Catriona, however, stumbles onto the historic town of Nessebar, which is over 3000 years old, and realizes that there is more to the place than meets the eye. She goes on to visit the Castra Rubra winery, where she finds out about the history of Viticulture in Bulgaria and the process of wine making.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Benafsha embarks on a whirlwind adventure in Ahmedabad. With just 48 hours in the city, she is determined to make the most of it, but how?

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Food Fact Fun The Hague, Netherlands
programme.desc: From exploring a vintage car museum to scaling a 5 meter ice-wall and sampling a rich bread cookie, Watch Alex exploring The Hague, also known as the “International city of peace”.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: A modern European oil city built on the back of a rich maritime heritage, Aberdeen is the energetic kingpin of northeast Scotland. While the boom times may come and go, the dynamic coastal metropolis never ceases to thrill with its free museums, outdoor adventures and natural attractions right on the city’s doorstep.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Požarevac and visits the ancient town of Viminacium. Later visits National Museum, concluding with Majdanpek’s Rajkova Pecina Caves.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Boarding Pass Rovaniemi, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline Nsingi Nkosi goes to Rovaniemi, where she visits a husky farm and finds out about about breeding and raising huskies.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: For the people of Sofia, preserving its heritage is sacrosanct, and this can be seen in the way the city's infrastructure is built around its archeological treasures. Catriona realizes this when she roams around the cobblestone streets of the city. With every monument she visits, she finds herself transported to a different era, right from Perperikon fort, which narrate stories of the Byzantine empire, to Boyana church, which is home to some of the earliest examples of medieval artwork.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 1(Eng)
programme.desc: From lazing in hammocks by the beach to sipping drinks on a private yacht, Kim realizes that Maldives is the perfect destination to unwind in style.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Food Fact Fun Rotterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying dishes like Stroopwafel and Palat Stoofvlees to visiting the Erasmus bridge, cube houses and wall painting on the streets, Alex explores Rotterdam.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Since medieval times Aberdeenshire and its northwestern neighbour Moray have been the richest and most fertile regions of the Highlands. Aberdeenshire is famed for its Aberdeen Angus beef cattle, its many fine castles and the prosperous 'granite city' of Aberdeen.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Explore Majdanpek with our host as the city brings the viewers closer to the treasures strewn across the Serbian countryside.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Boarding Pass Levi, Finland
programme.desc: Levi is Finland's largest and fastest-growing ski destination. Emeline is here, to find out the exciting activities that Levi offers, in summer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: With snow-capped peaks rising over primeval forests and traditional villages, Paro is like an Oriental Switzerland. On a visit to Paro, Radhika explores famous monasteries such as the Rinpung Dzong and Takstang Monastery, and learns the history and legends associated with them. Along the way, she finds out the secrets to the quintessential Bhutanese peace and contentment.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Great World Hotels, Four Seasons 2(Eng)
programme.desc: An invigorating spa treatment, a cooking lesson, a snorkeling session – Kim has experiences in the Maldives that leave her completely rejuvenated.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Food Fact Fun Utrecht, Netherlands
programme.desc: From trying Orange zest beer and traditional Dutch dishes to exploring St.Martin's Cathedral, Dom Tower and enjoying go karting and stand up paddle boat ride, watch Alex enjoy his trip in Utrecht.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: In the enchanting landscapes of Inverness, Robbie’s journey takes a whimsical turn: from eccentric to downright magical.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: Heather explores Nis,one of the oldest cities in Europe.She visits a concentration camp and later paraglides to end by watching a musical performance.

programme.title: Boarding Pass
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Boarding Pass Ruka Kuusamo, Finland
programme.desc: Emeline goes to Ruka-Kuusamo, where she tries river rafting. She also meets a reindeer herder,who tells her about the unique ways of herding reindeer.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Actress and travel enthusiast, Radhika Bangia explores the enigma that is Bhutan, when she visits Thimpu, the capital city with no traffic lights and no skyscrapers invading the skyline. Here, she checks out significant sights such as the Tibetan-style National Memorial Chorten, the National Library and the Folk Heritage Museum in order to understand more about the beliefs, history, architecture and cuisine of Bhutan.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 World Heritage Ancient Temples of Egypt, Egypt (ENG)
programme.desc: Explore the ancient heritage sites of Abu Simbel, the Philae complex of Nubia and the Hatshepsut Temple to unravel the mystical stories behind the ancient temples of Egypt.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Food Fact Fun Gouda, Netherlands
programme.desc: Alex tries traditional Dutch food in Leiden, learns about Dutch history at Prinsenhof Museum, visits a Gothic church, a local cheese market and Delftware factory at Gouda.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 10 Days Scotland Isle Of Skye (ENG)
programme.desc: The grand finale of Robbie’s wild homecoming unfolds amidst the rugged beauty of the Isle of Skye.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 Backpack Resavsk Pecina, Serbia
programme.desc: Continue exploring Serbia with Heather as she visits the Manasija monastery, Resavska caves, ending with a joyride onboard Eight of Sargan rail line.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 With Love From Mauritius Ep 1
programme.desc: Krisann and Nathan’s vacation in Mauritius begins in Le Morne, where an unexpected adventure awaits the latter.

programme.title: Xplore Bhutan
programme.desc: Known as Druk Yul or the “Land of the Thunder Dragon”, Bhutan is the country of mountains, monasteries and mystery. Radhika Bangia finds this to be true when she visits Punakha, the former capital of Bhutan, where she marvels at the architecture of Punakha Dzong and gets to know the story behind the two rivers, Mo Chhu and Po Chhu. She also explores the sacred temples and Mebar Tsho lake of Bumthang, the religious heart of Bhutan, and gets to know the local legends.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 World Spas Kempenki, Jordan (ENG)
programme.desc: Jamie Srubis tries out spa treatments, which are inspired by the Dead Sea and the desert surroundings at Hotel Kempinski Ishtar in Jordan.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Food Fact Fun Dubai 1
programme.desc: After Burj Khalifa, Alex has a traditional Emirati platter, visits the gold market and skiing rink, and goes for a camel safari and camping.

programme.title: City break
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 City Breaks Innsbruck, Austria
programme.desc: Nestled in the mighty Alps, tour the Austrian city of Innsbruck with Sabrina and explore a town that’s alpine-urban yet traditional in nature.

programme.title: Backpack Serbia
programme.desc: In her final leg of journey, Heather visits the Uvac canyon, tries locally prepared pie, ending with Kopaonik National Park and Jelovarnik waterfalls.

programme.title: With Love From Mauritius
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 With Love From Mauritius Ep 2
programme.desc: On an island-hopping adventure in Mauritius, Krisann and Nathan find out that time works differently on these islands.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 XP Guide Copenhagen, Denmark
programme.desc: A homely place where the aroma of freshly baked bread greets you as people smoothly glide along on their bicycles. Welcome to Copenhagen.

programme.title: Unwind
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Unwind Hotel Oriole, Sri Lanka
programme.desc: Indeya explores the Cinnamon plantations, tries a local dish and witnesses a traditional dance performance.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Food Fact Fun Dubai 2
programme.desc: Alex has varied experiences in Dubai like trying Lebanese cheese bread, visiting a coffee museum, going to IMG Worlds of Adventure and more.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.title: XP Guide
programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: Food Fact Fun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Food Fact Fun Amsterdam, Netherlands
programme.desc: In Amsterdam, Alex tries Bitterballen, cannabis cake and visits Heineken Experience brewery. He explores Zaanse Schans village with windmills and Coster Diamonds, the oldest diamond polishing factory.

programme.title: 10 Days Scotland
programme.desc: Robbie’s journey to reconnect with his Scottish roots begins in Edinburgh, the stunning capital city perched on extinct volcanoes. Navigating the twists of the Royal Mile, strutting around the majestic Edinburgh castle and learning to sip scotch like a true Scotsman, he feels a tad closer to his heritage. The real fun kicks in, however, when he stumbles onto a rather flamboyant way to unleash his inner Highlander.

programme.title: Xplore Bulgaria
programme.desc: Like Rome, Plovdiv straddles seven hills; but as Europe’s oldest continuously inhabited city, it’s far more ancient. As Catriona takes a tour of the city to see its iconic attractions such as a Roman Amphitheatre, which was once the setting for gladiator fights, and the striking Baroque Saints Constantine and Helena Church, she begins to see how seamlessly modern life blends with the age-old ruins. Along the way, she realizes why Plovdiv is called the ‘Eternal City’ of Bulgaria.

programme.desc: Stockholm, the capital and largest city of Sweden, was built on 14 Islands. This place is also sometimes referred as Venice of the north.

programme.title: Profile Marcel Remy - On top of Miroir de l´Argentine
programme.desc: It is his favorite route: the 450 meter north-west face of the famous Miroir de l’Argentine. For more than the 200th time, Marcel Remy, father of Yves and Claude Remy, climbs this classic peak with his sons on August 22, 2017. At the age of 94.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour 2106/17 - Part 2 - Austria
programme.desc: The World Snowboard Federation (WSF) is the international organization exclusively working to develop the sport of snowboarding at all levels, especially with worldwide events four young and talented riders.

programme.title: Spartan Race European Championships 2017 - Andorra
programme.desc: With over 200 events in 30 countries worldwide the spartan race series is perhaps the leading global brand in obstacle course racing challenging competitors on some of the toughest courses ever devised.

programme.title: Far Away
programme.desc: Matthias Haunholder and Matthias Mayr present a big mountain freeski film, primarily shot in Austria. Through stunning ski footage and heartfelt interviews, the film explores the intense emotions of parents and loved ones as they cope with the risks faced by the skiers.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europe's premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: Simple Session 2025 - Skate Finals MEN
programme.desc: Simple Session is back at Unibet Arena in Tallinn, Estonia – celebrating its massive 25-year anniversary! A quarter-century of mind-blowing BMX riding and skateboarding, unforgettable moments, and a global community of athletes pushing the limits.Hoppla!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #30: WES E-Bike World Series #1 & #2
programme.desc: In der heutigen Folge werfen wir einen Blick auf die erste und zweite Runde der World E-Bike Series 2023 in Monaco und Bologna, Italien. Aber wer kann die Rennen der Männer und Frauen gewinnen? Lasst es uns herausfinden!

programme.title: WOF 2023 #31: European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 - Mid Season Recap
programme.desc: Die ersten Events der European Freestyle Pro Tour 2023 sind vorbei und wir werfen einen Blick zurück auf die besten Windsurfer der Welt und ihre epischen Tricks auf dem Wasser.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #32: Ötztaler Radmarathon 2023
programme.desc: Der Ötztaler Radmarathon 2023 (AUT) ist der anspruchsvollste Radmarathon der Alpen und besticht durch seinen Mix aus Tal- und Hochgebirgslandschaften, die zu einer einzigartigen Atmosphäre beitragen.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #33: Mystic Skate Cup 2023
programme.desc: In dieser Episode ist es soweit: Der Mystic Skate Cup 2023 in Prag, Tschechische Republik, steht vor der Tür. Einige der besten Skateboarder der Welt werden ihr Können zeigen und das Event zu einem Spektakel machen. Werfen wir einen Blick darauf!

programme.title: ON Surf

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Sal (CPV) – Rider Profile | Elena Moreno
programme.desc: Cape Verde is hosting the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the best kitesurfers in the world like Elena Moreno. From breathtaking freestyle tricks to impressive racing moments, her determination and talent are on display.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #28: Queen & King of the Court
programme.desc: For the fourth year running Hamburg will host a Queen & King of the Court tournament. From May 30 till June 2nd the best of the best will travel once again to the harbor city on the Elbe River to fight for the titles of Queens and Kings of Hamburg.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #29: Mystic Skate Cup 2024
programme.desc: At the end of June, the 29th annual of the legendary Mystic sk8 Cup took place in Prague – Štvanice island. In these historical records, you can see that the 30th anniversary is approaching, but already now, there was a lot to see and it was an incredible spectacle.

programme.title: An Endless Summer
programme.desc: Through the testimonies of six characters and with the help of amateur footage drawn from three decades of rider archives, this exclusive documentary showcases the birth of urban skateboarding in Marseille.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #35: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: WOF 2024 #26: Freestyle Pro Tour
programme.desc: Today we are visiting the Windsurfers paradise which is why the Freestyle Pro Tour is visiting it every year for its biggest event of the season. This will be the first ever FPT event that runs all three Freestyle windsurfing disciplines at the same time.

programme.title: The Mt. Logan Wanderers
programme.desc: At 5959m, Mount Logan is the 2nd highest peak in North America, and certainly one of the wildest mountains in the world. To reach it, Hélias Millerioux, Alex Marchesseau, Thomas Delfino, and Gregory Douillard did not choose the easy option.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the world's best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the world's best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2025 - Axamer Lizum (AUT) - Live delayed
programme.desc: Be part of the World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2025 in Axamer Lizum, Austria! At this exciting high-speed event, the best downhill skateboarders from all over the world will race down the picturesque Alpine roads at breathtaking speeds.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #34: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU)
programme.desc: Bei der diesjährigen Jubiläumsausgabe gehen Teilnehmer aus über 55 Nationen an den Start, darunter die weltbesten Hard-Enduro-Fahrer wie Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: WOF 2023 #35: GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023 - The Stars of Big Air
programme.desc: Heute machen wir einen großen Sprung zur GKA Kitesurfing World Tour 2023. Einige der besten Surfer der Welt messen sich in der spektakulärsten Kiteboarding-Disziplin - dem Big Air.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #36: SPAR Swiss Epic 2023
programme.desc: Vom 15. bis 19. August kämpfen Zweierteams im malerischen Graubünden um den Gesamtsieg und wichtige UCI-Mountainbike-Punkte beim Swiss Epic. Mit mehr als 350km und fast 12.000 Höhenmetern wird den besten Mountainbikern alles abverlangt.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #37: ITF Beach Tennis World Tour 2023 - Sand Series Saarlouis Classic (GER)
programme.desc: Die Sand Series kehrt noch in diesem Monat an den Ort zurück, an dem alles begann: nach Saarlouis, wo die Serie 2021 erstmals stattfand. Der ehemalige Weltranglistenerste Michele Cappelletti wird zum ersten Mal mit André Baran antreten.

programme.title: 5 Peaks in One Day - Mountaineering
programme.desc: Zermatt, Switzerland - Swiss alpinist Andreas Steindl (26) has accomplished what most people deem impossible: he ran 30.66 kilometres from Zermatt to Saas Fee crossing five 4000m peaks. in only 7 hours, 45 minutes and 44 seconds.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The world's best freeriders will compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The first stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 19th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: Roc d’Azur 2024

programme.title: WOF 2024 #30: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024
programme.desc: World’s biggest long-distance triathlon: DATEV Challenge Roth 2024July 7th, 2024The world’s best athletes will conquer the traditional triathlon distance of 3.8 km swimming, 180 km cycling and 42.2 km running through the district of Roth in Bavaria, Germany.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #31: LAAX Highline World Championships 2024

programme.desc: Stopover of the kite surfing discipline on the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour in Sylt, Germany. The Defender GKA Kite World Cup Sylt is held in two disciplines - Kite-Surf and Hydrofoil Big Air.

programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.desc: RB Romaniacs challenges hundreds of dedicated amateur participants to compete alongside the world's best professionals. They gather in Sibiu, Romania. Participants come from over 60 countries and continents around the world.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #38: WES E-Bike World Series Round #3 & #4
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode reisen wir nach Italien und Belgien zu Runde 3 und 4 der World E-Bike Series. Die weltbesten Mountainbikerinnen und Mountainbiker werden darum kämpfen, wer in der Mitte des Rennkalenders die Führung übernimmt.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #39: FIA Karting European Championships
programme.desc: In der heutigen Episode besuchen wir die zukünftigen Formular 1 Stars bei der FIA Karting Europameisterschaft 2023 in Cremona, Italien. Schnallen Sie sich an und starten Sie Ihre Motoren, denn wir werden gleich auf Platz 1 fahren.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #40: BetCity Royal Championships Queen & King of the Court 2023
programme.desc: Dieses Turnier ist größer als je zuvor, die besten Spieler der Welt kommen vom 5. bis 10. September nach 'Manhattan an der Maas'. Ein 'königliches' Stadion direkt im Stadtzentrum am Henegouwerplein ist der Schauplatz und Nebenplätze in den Vororten umrahmen dieses Ereignis.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #41: Vanora ENGADINWIND by Dakine 2023
programme.desc: Der VANORA ENGADINWIND by Dakine kehrt 2023 mit viel spannender Windsurf-Action auf dem Silvaplanasee in der Schweiz zurück. Der ENGADINWIND ist auch Gastgeber der ersten iQ FOiL U21 Weltmeisterschaft, die für das olympische Programm in Paris 2024 ausgewählt wurde.

programme.title: Episode 44
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 44

programme.title: Athlete profile: climber Lindsey Hamm's (USA) journey from concrete to peaks
programme.desc: Mammut athlete Lindsey Hamm, a professional mountaineer and mountain guide, brings a breath of fresh air to the world of mountaineering. This film gives an insight into her life and a recent expedition to the wild Charakusa Valley in Pakistan

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #2 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Freeride World Tour 2021 "Live Summary"
